about_the_game:
The universe is in danger with the threat of evil wizards. Your mission is to capture and eliminate them before your time runs out.

Mage Hunters uses capture and elimination mechanics in the best style of classic board games. With beautiful graphics, pleasant soundtrack and high replayability, this game will bring to you hours of fun, relaxation and challenges.

  • Designed for people who like tabletop and board games;

  • Enjoy a game with a balanced level of difficult that will force you to use all of your logic and strategic sense;

  • A mix between clasical board game and modern video game effects;

  • A game for people who like intelligent mechanics.

HOW TO PLAY

GOAL: Capture and destroy all evil mages.

1) You roll the dice to select a character
2) If you get 1, 2 or 3 a warrior is selected; if you get 4, 5 or 6 a mage is selected
3) When a warrior is selected you can choose roll the dice again to reposition it trying to capture a mage or take a card to apply a special power
4) You must capture all mages before the time counter reachs the end position

This is a challeging game to you that like strategic combats.
